<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:d888022c837932107f44d4abc1da1e4eANYTHING^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Charging Request">4888cee8837932107f44d4abc1da1ee8</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><published_ref/><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
current.district = '';
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
    var ga = new GlideAjax('GetLocationDistrict');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocationDistrict');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_location_id', newValue);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
        if (response) {
            g_form.setValue('district', response);
        }
    });
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Auto populate district</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zachery.howton</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-11 08:39:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f2bba93c833132107f44d4abc1da1e1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto populate district</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ChargeSOS" source="x_cdltd_chargesos">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ChargeSOS">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_f2bba93c833132107f44d4abc1da1e1a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zachery.howton</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-11 08:43:29</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
